name: Talus Flow
condition_immunities: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, unconscious

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two Slam attacks. If both attacks hit a Med or smaller target the target is grappled (escape DC 13).

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 10 (2d6+3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Grind
actions.desc: Grinds its form over one creature in its space or that is grappled by it. Target takes 21 (6d6) bludgeoning damage (DC 13 Dex half). Flow regains hp equal to half the damage taken if creature is not a Construct or Undead.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: While motionless indistinguishable from normal pile of rocks pebbles and scree.

special_abilities.name: Landslide
special_abilities.desc: If it moves at least 15 ft. before entering creature's space creature: DC 13 Dex save or knocked prone. If target is prone talus flow can make one Slam vs. it as a bonus action.

special_abilities.name: Scree Form
special_abilities.desc: Can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. Flow can move through a space as narrow as 3 inches wide with o squeezing. Flow's space is difficult terrain. When a creature starts its turn in flow's space it must make DC 13 Dex save or be knocked prone.

special_abilities.name: Stone Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: Has advantage on Dex (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.
